post.date: Posted: Sat Oct 07, 2006 12:09 am Post subject: Cannot view heightmap
post.author: Regulator
post.body:
Cannot view these textures:
pak001.pk4\dds\addnormals\models\monsters\imp\imp_local heightmap models monsters imp a_imp_b08a 10.dds
pak001.pk4\dds\addnormals\models\monsters\imp\imp_local heightmap models monsters imp imp_bmp 6.dds
tried Photoshop + dds plugin and WTV. None recognizes them.
_________________
DOWNLOAD HS MOD

post.date: Posted: Sat Oct 07, 2006 12:20 am Post subject:
post.author: kat
post.body:
You need the ATI Compressonator for those because they use an ATI only compression filter (all the normalmaps do).

http://www.quake3bits.com/htm/tools_utilities.htm#misc
_________________
Co-Admin - Modelling and modding tutorials and tips

post.date: Posted: Sat Oct 07, 2006 12:32 am Post subject:
post.author: Regulator
post.body:
Ok thanks, that was a quick answer.
_________________
